summary:
Working Experience:
16 Years working experience in Supply Chain Management of both national and Multinational company. Working experience in HINDUSTAN Unilever for a South Asia role further given the opportunity to know more about India, Srilanka, Bangladesh and Pakistan market. I've worked for Square Pharmaceutical Ltd,  Unilever BD Ltd, Hindustan Unilever Ltd, International Beverage Pvt Ltd (Coca Cola) and finally I've joined back in Unilever Bangladesh Ltd again in Sept 2018 & lead the team Bangladesh procurement till Apr 2023.. Recently I've moved to Rotterdam to take up new challenge in Unilever Europe B.V.

Professional Certifications: 
1. Diploma in IPSCM (International Purchasing & Supply Chain Management) from ITC, Geneva
2. CPSM (Certified Professional in Supply Management) from ISM, USA
3. SCMP (Supply Chain Management Professional) from SCMA, Canada 
4. CSCM (Certified Supply Chain Manager) from ISCEA, USA

Professional involvement:
1. Guest speaker of Diploma in International purchasing and Supply chain Management at DBI regulated by ITC, Geneva
2. Guest Speaker of Supply Chain Management, BBA program, BUP, Mirpur Cantonment
3. Executive member of Bangladesh Supply Chain Management Society (BSCMS)
4. VP, SAS (Supply Chain Alumni Society), Dhaka  

Specialties: Team Lead, Resilience, Sourcing, Inventory planning, logistic management, Supplier selection, negotiation, purchasing, LC processing, Import, Supplier evaluation

Support BB team in launching new products', 'title': 'Buying Manager (Packaging), Supply Chain Management', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 998308, 'name': 'Square Pharmaceuticals Ltd', 'logo': None, 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/square_4/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': '48, Mohakhali C/A, Dhaka-1209', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'SQUARE', 'description': '•	Assesses requirement of raw material for both local and imported items of Pharmaceuticals, Cephalosporin, Insulin, SVPO, MDI, Agrovet unit, Pesticide unit, Herbal, PET Bottle Division, Pellet unit, Chemical Division
•               Support in maintaining optimum inventory
•               Ensure on time delivery 
•	Sourcing of product as per requirement of Production Planning and Inventory Control (PPIC). 
•	Request for quotation (RFQ) as per requisition. 
•	Take approval of material from end user. 
•	Negotiate with suppliers for price, lead time, delivery terms and quality if required. 
•	Preparation of comparative statement for approval in Purchase Committee. 
•	Collect PI for imported items and issue Purchase order for locally procured items. 
•	Prepare Block List for Pharmaceuticals raw materials 
•	Follow up of LC procedure
•	Peruse suppliers to delivery on time. 
•	Follow up the shipment status and adjust as per ETA 
•	Communicate with clearing agent for accelerating the procedure
•	Ensure payment against LC to the supplier
•	Ensure on time payment for local supply
•	Maintain close coordination with internal and external Customer. 
•	Vendor evaluation and continuous development. 
•	If any discrepancy found after the arrival of material claim for compensation.', 'title': 'Senior Executive', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Berger Paints Bangladesh Ltd', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Uttara', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'company': 'Berger Paints Bangladesh Ltd', 'description': 'Worked on feasibility study of launching Laquer polish by Berger in Bangladesh', 'title': 'Internship', 'employment_type': None}]}]
